Fast Track: This article is part of Liferay's Fast Track publication program, providing a repository of solutions delivered while supporting our customers. Fast Track articles are unverified and users are responsible for verifying how well the information fits with their particular situation and project requirements.

Resolution
title: Backup in non-production environment
